entry.title: Vitamin D, Covid-19 and You!
entry.content:
Post 188724 deleted:
This post was deleted for the following reason: Hey this is framed in a kind of conspiratorial way that makes it feel like misinformation and we're trying to be careful around coronavirus related info. There are clinical trials related to vitamin D; maybe there's a better way to collect reliable info on where things stand on vitamin D? -- LobsterMitten
entry.summary: Post 188724 deleted: This post was deleted for the following reason: Hey this is framed in a kind of conspiratorial way that makes it feel like misinformation and we're trying to be careful around coronavirus related info. entry.title: Indian women most unattractive in the world: Richard Nixon

link.title: Indian women most unattractive in the world: Richard Nixon

entry.content:
Post 188710 deleted:
This post was deleted for the following reason: It's ok to post about this article but the thread will go better with a different framing that (a) doesn't reproduce a bunch of his gross remarks right up top and (b) doesn't seem like it's offering "just how unattractive are different women" up as a thing to debate - contact us about reframing? -- LobsterMitten

entry.title: Vichy Democrats
entry.content:
Post 188611 deleted:
This post was deleted for the following reason: "The Dems are enabling Trump's slide to fascism by not fighting hard enough" is a thesis we've covered in extreme length and depth on every angle in the last several years. There is no shortage of this kind of comparison; we've got multiple other posts arguing around the details of the slide to fascism and how people of prominence should be fighting back just in the last week. But staking the whole post around just this comparison invites really really pointless fights over whether the exact historical comparison holds up, making for superheated fighting (superheated as if one side were somehow in favor of Nazis) among people who all agree Trump's a fascist monster and everything should be done to stop him. It's a bad dynamic to set up, let's not. -- LobsterMitten
entry.summary: Post 188611 deleted: This post was deleted for the following reason: "The Dems are enabling Trump's slide to fascism by not fighting hard enough" is a thesis we've covered in extreme length and depth on every angle in the last several years. There is no shortage of this kind of comparison; we've got multiple other posts arguing around the details of the slide to fascism and how people of prominence should be fighting back just in the last week. But staking the whole post around just this comparison invites really really pointless fights over whether the exact historical comparison holds up, making for superheated fighting (superheated as if one side were somehow in favor of Nazis) among people who all agree Trump's a fascist monster and everything should be done to stop him. It's a bad dynamic to set up, let's not. -- LobsterMitten
